property.name: typename
property.shortdesc: The class name of the object.

property.name: textRange
property.shortdesc: The text range of the story.

property.name: textFrames
property.shortdesc: The text frame items in this story.

property.name: textSelection
property.shortdesc: The selected text (ranges) in the story.

property.name: characters
property.shortdesc: All the characters in this text range.

property.name: words
property.shortdesc: All the words in this text range.

property.name: lines
property.shortdesc: All the lines in this text range.

property.name: paragraphs
property.shortdesc: All the paragraphs in this text range.

property.name: textRanges
property.shortdesc: All the text in this text range.

property.name: insertionPoints
property.shortdesc: All the insertion points in this text range.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of characters in the story.
